data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Gorgol.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gorgol, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Gorgol. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 818 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 273,964 lost in Gorgol that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Gorgol, Mauritania will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Soninke people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Soninke people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Soninke people is yours.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Gorgol, Mauritania.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Gorgol to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Gorgol, Mauritania honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
